headline: Tech Weekly: highlights from CES
text: Guardian Technology editor Charles Arthur takes us through some interesting trends from CES 2012  3D printing, ultrabooks and smart TV. Plus Aleks is joined by Matt Brian from The Next Web and Guardian developer Dan Catt to discuss this week's news  which includes Michael Gove's plans to revamp IT education in UK schools, Google's trouble with Kenya's business directory Mocality, and the latest on the US's proposed SOPA and PIPA legislation. Don't forget to...
